dimension: image, sheet: 6 7/16 x 3 3/8 in. (16.35 x 8.57 cm)
title: Woman Bathing Her Feet at a Brook
text: Female nudes dominated Rembrandt's final years as a printmaker. All seem to be based on direct observation of the model, and exhibit intimate appreciation of reality and vulnerability. Here one can make out the back of a chair, but Rembrandt's thoughts wandered into the realm of fantasy, and he relocated his model to a waterside embankment.
creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
